22  """An API to provide spell checking for use in checks or elsewhere.""" 
23   
24  import sys 
25   
26  available = False 
27   
28  try: 
29      # Enchant 
30      from enchant import checker, DictNotFoundError, Error as EnchantError 
31      available = True 
32      checkers = {} 

33 -    def check(text, lang): 

34          if not lang in checkers: 
35              try: 
36                  checkers[lang] = checker.SpellChecker(lang) 
37                  # some versions only report an error when checking something 
38                  checkers[lang].check('') 
39              except EnchantError, e: 
40                  # sometimes this is raised instead of DictNotFoundError 
41                  print >> sys.stderr, str(e) 
42                  checkers[lang] = None 
43   
44          if not checkers[lang]: 
45              return 
46          spellchecker = checkers[lang] 
47          spellchecker.set_text(unicode(text)) 
48          for err in spellchecker: 
49              yield err.word, err.wordpos, err.suggest() 

50   
51  except ImportError: 

52 -    def check(text, lang): 

53          return []
